item.title: OWASP Cornucopia Online And Mobile
item.description: This week, the OWASP Cornucopia project announced some significant updates, and I’m proud to have contributed one. I like to tell a story, though, so first a bit of history. At Secure Delivery, weâ€™ve always used the card games Cornucopia and Elevation of Privilege and love the agile approach to threat modelling that puts development teams at the heart of uncovering security issues in their systems. Three years ago, in May 2021, a global pandemic was making it pretty damn hard to sit in a room together and play cards.
